articles.description: Ed Sheeran, 30, appeared on the BBC One show on Wednesday night to promote his new song Bad Habits and was forced to correct her when she claimed 8million people attended his tour.
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran was forced to correct presenter Alex Jones on the One Show after she made several errors about his career in an awkward interview.
